list_definition.definition: something given in return for or got from work done, good behaviour/behavior etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He was given a gold watch as a reward for his services to the firm

list_definition.definition: a sum of money offered for finding a criminal, lost or stolen property etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: A reward of $100 has been offered to the person who finds the diamond brooch.

list_definition.definition: to give a reward to someone for something

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He was rewarded for his services
